itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Metal Solvent acquired by Alchemy and Zinc Ingots. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Skilled.

※ Find Vatudun in Keplan and complete the Materials for Skills Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Professional Level 10 and Processing Professional Level 5. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Zinc Ingot
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Melted Zinc Shards. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Beginner.

※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Apprentice Level 4 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Metal Solvent
item.desc: A material used to change metals into a pure crystal form through Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained through Alchemy.

item.name: Altinova Ferry Decoration
item.desc:
A Mediahn decoration that can be attached to ferry. Lowers the chance of breaking trade items. 
Equipping 3 or more set items :
Movement Speed +3%
All Defense +30(Currently Unavailable)
- Able to attach on : Ferry
Able to enhance with Black Stone(Armor)

item.name: Mediah Fishing Rod
item.desc: Ash tree float. It shortens the auto-fishing time.\n\nCan be enhanced with Blackstone (Weapon).

item.name: Yuria Staff
item.desc: A staff possessed with a hatred for Humankind.

item.name: Merchant Wagon Badge
item.desc:
A banner for a four-wheeled wagon.

- Can be Installed on: Four-Wheeled Wagon

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: White Wagon Badge
item.desc:
A banner for a wagon.

- Can be Installed on: Wagon

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Yuria Shortsword
item.desc: A Shortsword possessed with a hatred for Humankind.

item.name: Ultimate Yuria Shortsword
item.desc:
A Yuria Shortsword developed to its maximum potential.
There is a small chance this will be developed when Refining a common Yuria Shortsword.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Yuria Shortsword of Crimson Flame, Yuria Shortsword of Destruction, Yuria Shortsword of Temptation, Yuria Shortsword

item.name: Yuria Shortsword of Temptation
item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Yuria Shortsword.
It can be developed by Refining a common Yuria Shortsword.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Yuria Shortsword of Temptation, Yuria Shortsword

item.name: Yuria Shortsword of Destruction
item.desc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Yuria Shortsword.
It can be developed by Refining a common Yuria Shortsword.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Yuria Shortsword of Destruction, Yuria Shortsword

item.name: Yuria Shortsword of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Yuria Shortsword.
It can be developed by Refining a common Yuria Shortsword.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Yuria Shortsword of Crimson Flame, Yuria Shortsword

item.name: Ultimate Yuria Staff
item.desc:
A Yuria staff at its maximum potential.
It has a low chance of being crafted when upgrading a Yuria staff.

- Restore Max Durability: Yuria Staff of Crimson Flame, Yuria Staff of Destruction, Yuria Staff of Temptation, Yuria Staff
